title: Let's Gank Java - 2st
content:
Bitwise Operation.

public class BitwiseOperators
{
    public static void main(String args[]){
        int a = 0b1100;//二进制
        int b = 0b1010;
        print("a  ",a);
        print("a&b",a&b);
        print("a|b",a|b);
        print("a^b",a^b);
        print("~a",~a);
        print("a<<2",a<<2);
        print("a>>2",a>>2);
        print("无符号移位运算: a>>>2",a>>>2);
    }
    static void print(String prefix,int n){
        String s = Integer.toBinaryString(n);//转二进制
        while(s.length()<4) s="0"+s;//补0
        System.out.println(prefix+" "+s);
    }
}

>>> means unsigned bitwise operation.
